    • Method Detail

      • stripFormatPrefix

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String stripFormatPrefix(java.lang.String formatString)
        Deprecated. use directly DataFieldFormatType instead
        Strips the format prefix (currently java: or joda:) from the beginning of the given format string. If no prefix is found, the format string is left unchanged.
        Parameters:
        formatString - a format string to be stripped of the prefix
        Returns:
        the format string with the prefix stripped
